Author: Bravocoin.io
Title: delete
Body: We feel that we have much better partnerships, SportsCoin launched without a well thought out roadmap or whitepaper. You'll be able to use our token for far more than just sports, one of our targets is amusement parks with their overpriced ATM fees, another is festivals where for example you buy wristbands to purchase food and beverages, with Bravocoin all of this could be done on the blockchain!  Quote from: HerrHeimlich on March 13, 2018, 06:04:50 PM Hey, just found out about Bravocoin. I’m curious what you can do with this token that you wouldn’t be able to do with ETH?  We are an industry specific token, we strive for Bravocoin to become the standard coin used for Sports & Entertainment purchases. From Equestrian races to Casinos, Bravocoin will be widely accepted  Quote from: joblessminer on March 13, 2018, 06:36:59 PM I see here your projected price: “PROJECTED BRAVOCOIN PRICE DECEMBER 2018: $1.00 – $5.00/COIN” How did you come up with these figures? Is it based on similar tokens?  We're basing this on some of the partnerships we have established and future investors buying the token on exchanges. Keep checking this topic because we are going to post some big announcements regarding the collaboration with our partners in the near future!  Quote from: Crypto_Man1212 on March 13, 2018, 06:38:25 PM Nice partnerships. What would you say they bring to the table that helps out Bravocoin?  They are key to helping us get Bravocoin launched by having several partners already willing to work with Bravocoin's team. We feel that our partners will be our entry into becoming the largest coin in the industry  Quote from: deeltje on March 13, 2018, 06:52:54 PM Where did you get the 10 round ICO system from? Has this been used before successfully?  We liked how the DAO was setup with different buy in prices, we felt that it would be fair to our earlier adopters to offer them a better price

Title: delete
Body: Historically, "Bravo!" was shouted at sporting events in Italy, to show applause or enthusiasm, we thought this name fit perfectly for our coin!

Author: Bravocoin.io
Title: delete
Body: Personally I'm most excited about Bravocoin being able to eliminate unnecessary costs/fees for our users. Credit card networks like Visa and MasterCard take in millions a year from revenue from entertainment events, we think it's insane that you can pay up to 6% in fees!

Author: nhungtruong379
Title: delete
Body: The sports industry today is a wide-reaching business. As much as $620 billion is spent every year in this industry, which caters to an ever-more fervent fan base. This complex business environment features numerous participants – from rights owners (clubs, leagues, federations and athletes) to sport agencies, sponsors and broadcasters – all potential users of Bravo Coin.
